title.rendered: Social Emotional Resources for Students and Families

content.rendered:
These are uncertain times for us all, and it is important to recognize the impact this situation and the loss of the school routine can have on children. Please use the resources below to help support your children. Click here for contact information for our Counseling Services.

Safe Schools Helpline: Report a situation that might affect the safety of our school community or talk to a trained counselor.

Articles and Resources:

  • Resources for managing anxiety and stress
    • Link has been archived
  • Talking to kids about the Coronavirus
  • WSWHE Adult and Student Well-Being Resources
  • Calm Breathing Techniques
    • Link has been archived
  • Mental Health Association in New York State, Inc.
  • Mental Health America Ten Tools
  • Saratoga County Resources for Supporting Mental Health
  • Mental Health First Aid
  • Personal Health Resilience

Videos:

  • Gain control of stressful energy
  • Rainbow Breath – Flow

Visuals:

  • Creating Healthy Routines
  • Owning Your Feelings
